i18n.key: The shop where the price will be applied. This field is only available when creating a price.
Tax applied on all electrical and electronic products, used for processing waste from these products.
Quantity at which the price may be applied.
Quantity up to which the price may be applied.
The product price for the chosen conditions. This price will be crossed out if the "discount price" is set.
Discounted price which, when set, is displayed crossed out on the website.
End of price validity. After this date, the price will no longer be active.
The start of validity date for the price. Before this date, the price will not be active.
The customer, pricing group or kit affected by this price. Leave empty to apply the price to everybody.
The VAT code used for converting between incl. or excl. taxes, as well as for calculating VAT amounts in orders.
